title: Eyes of the Peacock
description: Alex Rossi, a recently engaged wedding photographer, finds herself mystified after a freak accident compromises her life. While recovering, disturbing visions of a 1920s dancer haunt her and the mystery starts to bleed into her present life.As a reoccurring vision of the dancer holding a lifeless body invades Alexâ€™s dreams, she worries that she is losing her mind. When the past and the present merge, tensions escalate. Alex questions everything. In a twist of fate, secrets are revealed that alter the course of her life and the lives of many others.A tale of truth, justice and eternal love.
author: Dawn Gardner
